EmailTemplate.name: VinWorx KC Spring 2013 EarlyBird Ends 3/15
EmailTemplate.subject: VinWorx 'cheep' rates thru Friday
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.FirstName},
This is a friendly reminder that the Early-Bird Registration rates end at midnight on Friday, March 15th, for the VinWorx User Summit. This must-attend training event will kick-off the 'Class of 2013' with improved curriculum and even more access to our home office VinPro Performance Management teams. Don't get left behind - take advantage of our 'cheep' $399 rates today!
For more information and to register: http://www.vinsolutions.com/vinworx/
But you must hurry. Tickets are selling out fast and you only have a few days left to register at this rate:
When: April 15th - 17th, 2013
Where: Kansas City, MO - right in VinSolutions' back yard!
What: VinWorx is a networking and advanced certification summit for MotoSnap users. A hands-on workshop held under the VinUniversity umbrella, attendees will have the opportunity to participate in specialized sessions; training on new and existing integrated product solutions.
For more information and to register: http://www.vinsolutions.com/vinworx/
* Save time and money through FastTrax Motosnap Certification. * Benefit from the 1:1 consultation and the expert attention you will receive from Jim Nelson, Sr. Director of Performance Management, and his management staff. * Benefit from the REAL value of peer-to-peer collaboration, including exclusive workshops led by select VinSolutions' Dealers Advisory Board super-user members!
For more information and to register: http://www.vinsolutions.com/vinworx/
Local dealership with no need for a hotel stay? Contact us for a 'NOHOTEL' discount!
DAB or PC dealership? Contact us for your 'VIP' discount!
Any questions, feel free to contact: gina.reuscher@vinsolutions.com We hope to see you there!
Sincerely, Your dedicated VinCare Team
